mapper.select: select CONCAT(#{params.hz_startMonth},"-",#{params.hz_endMonth}) as aud_trm, t1.short_name as short_name,sum(t1.dbt_amt) as sum_dbt_amt, count(distinct t1.acct_id) as count_acct_id from hpeapb.sox_sum_cqqfwtj_1302_acct t1 inner join (select acct_id,max(aud_trm) max_mon from hpeapb.sox_sum_cqqfwtj_1302_acct where 1=1 and cmcc_prov_prvd_id=#{params.provId} and aud_trm between #{params.hz_startMonth} and #{params.hz_endMonth} group by 1) t2 on t1.acct_id=t2.acct_id and t1.aud_trm=t2.max_mon
